Budget management: Staying within budget while still delivering a high-quality event can be difficult, especially when dealing with unexpected expenses.
Venue selection: Finding a suitable venue that can accommodate the expected number of attendees and meet the event's requirements can be a challenge.
Catering: Ensuring that the catering meets the dietary needs and preferences of the attendees can be difficult, especially when dealing with a large group.
Audio-visual equipment: Ensuring that all audio-visual equipment is set up and functioning properly can be challenging, especially when dealing with a large group.
Security: Ensuring the safety and security of the attendees and the event itself can be a concern, especially when dealing with a large group.
